subject: Horse Racing
Haskell Invitational
lead_paragraph: Verrazano won the $1 million Haskell Invitational by nine and three-quarter lengths, the largest margin of victory in 46 runnings of Monmouth Park’s signature race.
snippet: Verrazano won the $1 million Haskell Invitational by nine and three-quarter lengths, the largest margin of victory in 46 runnings of Monmouth Park’s signature race.
